name: Zulip
natural_language_description: 这是 Zulip 节点。主要用于: Consume Zulip API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many users

to.name: to
to.description: The destination stream, or a comma-separated list containing the usernames (emails) of the recipients. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: The destination stream, or a comma-separated list containing the usernames (emails) of the recipients. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

content.name: content
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: The content of the message | (必填项)

stream.name: stream
stream.description: The destination stream, or a comma-separated list containing the usernames (emails) of the recipients. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stream.natural_language_description: 参数名: Stream Name or ID | 作用: The destination stream, or a comma-separated list containing the usernames (emails) of the recipients. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

topic.name: topic
topic.description: The topic of the message. Only required if type is stream, ignored otherwise. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
topic.natural_language_description: 参数名: Topic Name or ID | 作用: The topic of the message. Only required if type is stream, ignored otherwise. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the message | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: content (值: None) - The content of the message
propagateMode (值: None) - Which message(s) should be edited: just the one indicated in message_id, messages in the same topic that had been sent after this one, or all of them
topic (值: None) - The topic of the message. Only required for stream messages.

dataBinaryProperty.name: dataBinaryProperty
dataBinaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

additionalFieldsJson.name: additionalFieldsJson
additionalFieldsJson.description: JSON format parameters for stream creation
additionalFieldsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 作用: JSON format parameters for stream creation

subscriptions.name: subscriptions
subscriptions.description: A list of dictionaries containing the the key name and value specifying the name of the stream to subscribe. If the stream does not exist a new stream is created.
subscriptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subscriptions | 作用: A list of dictionaries containing the the key name and value specifying the name of the stream to subscribe. If the stream does not exist a new stream is created. | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: fullName (值: None) - The users full name
isAdmin (值: None) - Whether the target user is an administrator
isGuest (值: None) - Whether the target user is a guest
profileData (值: None) - A dictionary containing the to be updated custom profile field data for the user
role (值: None) - Role for the user

streamId.name: streamId
streamId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Stream ID | 作用: ID of stream to delete | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email address of the new user
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email address of the new user | (必填项)

fullName.name: fullName
fullName.description: The full name of the new user
fullName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Full Name | 作用: The full name of the new user | (必填项)

password.name: password
password.description: The password of the new user
password.natural_language_description: 参数名: Password | 作用: The password of the new user | (必填项)

shortName.name: shortName
shortName.description: The short name of the new user. Not user-visible.
shortName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Short Name | 作用: The short name of the new user. Not user-visible. | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The ID of user to deactivate
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: The ID of user to deactivate | (必填项)
